snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga was in no mood to hang about on Friday, racing to a one-set lead in just 18 minutes against Argentina's Juan Monaco some three hours after they first warmed up on another rain-interrupted day at Wimbledon....
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga was in no mood to hang about on Friday, racing to a one-set lead in just 18 minutes against Argentina's Juan Monaco some three hours after they first warmed up on another rain-interrupted day at Wimbledon.

headline.print_headline: Tennis: Playing Catch-Up, Tsonga and Berdych Finally Negotiate Round Two
headline.main: Tennis: Playing Catch-Up, Tsonga and Berdych Finally Negotiate Round Two
